title: E239 A Trash Pile of Ghostly Magazines and the Paranormal D.A.R.E. Program
description: It's episode 239 and we've got some big stories for you! First Em covers the history of famed paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren (including the Conjuring universe). Then Christine brings us the first in a two part series on Amanda Knox. Also, Eva may or may not still be in the Zoom waiting room... and that's why we drink!
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Em Schulz, Christine Schiefer)
